original: Blidberg, Carl Åke, skeppsredare, Göteborg, f. 11/10/02 i Gbg av dir. C. M. B. o. Elin Bredberg. G. 35 m. Kerstin Lindberg. Barn: Eva Marie-Louise, Elin Gunilla. — Elev v. Gbgs h. sam sk. o. Gbgs hand :in’st. Ut-bildn. inom sjöfartsbransch, gen. anst. h. Blidberg, Metcalfe & Co. i Gbg, h. Wait & Dodds i Newcastle on Tyne, i Agence Fred Oisen & C :ie i Paris, h. Dahlström & Co. i Hamburg, v. S. A. Linea Sueca Brazil La Plata i Bue-nos Aires o. h. A-B Sv. Brazil-La Plata Linjen i Gbg, egen verks. und. firma Rederi A-B C. A. BHdberg & Co. i Gbg sed. 33. Deläg. o. styr:led. i Blidiberg & Lagerwall A-B o. A-B Gbgs Skeppsfournering i Gbg.
translated: Blidberg, Carl Åke, shipowner, Gothenburg, born on October 11th, 1902 in Gothenburg to director C. M. B. and Elin Bredberg. Married in 1935 to Kerstin Lindberg. Children: Eva Marie-Louise, Elin Gunilla. He was a student at Gothenburg's Higher Social School and Gothenburg's Institute of Commerce. He received training in the shipping industry and worked at Blidberg, Metcalfe & Co. in Gothenburg, Wait & Dodds in Newcastle on Tyne, Agence Fred Oisen & Cie in Paris, Dahlström & Co. in Hamburg, S. A. Linea Sueca Brazil La Plata in Buenos Aires, and A-B Swedish Brazil-La Plata Linjen in Gothenburg. He established his own business, Rederi A-B C. A. Blidberg & Co. in Gothenburg in 1933. He was a co-owner and board member of Blidberg & Lagerwall A-B as well as A-B Gothenburg Ship Supply in Gothenburg.

affiliation.name: S. A. Linea Sueca Brazil La Plata
Rederi A-B C. A. Blidberg & Co.
